price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߓߊ߯ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߌߞߘߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߘߴߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߤߋ߫ ߸ ߝߟߌ߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߢߌ߲߬ ߠߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-awhum qālū inna hāulāi laḍāllūna
